column2: He is an amazing actor and he needs his rum.
column44: Bring Johnny Depp back as Jack Sparrow!
column52: For six solid years Johnny Depp has lived in misery. For six years Johnny Depp has been suffering at the hands of a woman who wanted to destroy him, by a woman who tried to use the great Me Too movement in her favor with false stories. Now he has justice! Amber Heard was found to have defamed Johnny with three statements in an op-ed that took away his reputation, hurt his family and friends, and took away many of his opportunities-one of which was our beloved Captain Jack Sparrow in the Disney franchise Pirates of the Caribbean. This is just one of many opportunities that he lost. Disney acted too quickly in response to these false allegations and took away from us our favorite character. Well, we want him back, so let's get their attention! We can help keep his vindication train going. Let's get this petition into the hands of Jerry Bruckheimer, mega-producer at The Walt Disney Co. Either way, he's won in our hearts. Let's recast Jack Sparrow!
column54:
Jerry Bruckheimer, The Walt Disney Co:
Please recast Jack Sparrow! We want our beloved character back and vow to boycott any future POTC film that does not involve Johnny Depp!

column2: The pirates movie is something me and my sons have all watched while they have been growing up. Johnny depp has been part of our family tradition I wish there were more to make more memories with. I'll buy him an alpaca

column2: …. because he was railroaded by a nut job narcissist and Disney’s response without evidence was idiotic when one considers absolutely nothing was confirmed at the time of their decision to drop Johnny.
